page.title: 15A FAMILY BUSINESS IN B.ASH.
page.content: {Linley Country Store}is a growing family business.It is located just out side Barkston Ash on the main Sherburn to Tadcaster road in what was until recently a petrol station.At the store it is possible to rent or purchase almost anything the{D.I.Y.}enthusiast could want from concrete mixers to chain saws.The store also sells a wide range of{feed}for both farm animals and family pets.Local horse owners can obtain everything they need to feed, groom, and saddle their horse. The store is open 6 days a week 8.30_ 5.30.and is in an ideal place to attract customers who are travelling to work along the main road.The store owners are extremely friendly and helpful.Long may they continue to prosper in their tastefully coverted filling station.
